alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Lake Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Twin Lakes, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 11, Valdosta Regional Airport and Kinderlou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
